We need to know more about this hooded man you saw, . Track him down for us.

[You must have equipment level 457 or higher to enter RK-9 Kennel.]

Rhodos asked you to track down the hooded man from the refinery. Once you got a good look at him, you confirmed this was Randun. Randun secretly took the Bloodshard and was creating a monstrous machine called RK-9. Eventually, after a fierce battle with RK-9, you were able to destroy it, and Randun faced his last moment.

, I've been thinking about this hooded man you saw in the refinery. I need to know more about him.

The picture you paint...his intense interest in weaponry...I just have a bad feeling it might be...

Well, it sounds like somebody I used to know."Who's that?"

An old friend...of sorts. He was once part of the federation.

I want to be wrong, but I need you to find out for sure. Track him down for me."Where should I look?"

Word around the Khirian Fighters is that Donakim actually tracked him to some suspicious facility, but didn't have the numbers to safely investigate further.

I'm not sure where Donakim is stationed right now, but Roderan knows. Go ask him when you get a chance.

Rhodos sent you? Hmm. Very well.

Donakim is near Tranquility Falls. He'll have more information on that facility he found.

Be careful, and make sure you've got enough people with you before you head in."I will. Thank you."
Ah, here to investigate the facility under the falls, are you? Good! We need someone who knows what they're doing!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Let's hope that's me."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I watched some shady hooded guy wander behind Tranquility Falls a few days ago. I thought it was weird, so I followed him—carefully, of course.

That's when I found it—a huge cave with a loud, constant whirring noise. Some kind of power plant, maybe? I'm not sure. I was alone, so I got back out of there pretty quick and sent word."So that's everything?"

That's all I've got.

I'd like to say there was more, but exploring further alone would have been a safety risk. You understand.

Once you've got a group you trust, head in and see for yourself what it's all about.

I really appreciate this!

!

I tried to hurry over to help out, but I couldn't get away any faster.

Did you find anything further about the hooded man?"Yes. His name is Randun."

Randun! It's as I suspected.

Blast it all, I wanted to be wrong. What's he doing in there?"He used the bloodshard to create a monstrous robot."

The bloodshard? Oh no. It's hard to believe that it's even the same man!

Listen, , you need to understand that when I knew him, Randun was... Well, I guess it hardly matters anymore. People change. Fussing over who they used to be doesn't get us anywhere.

Where is he now? How do we counter him now?"He died in the explosion."

He did? Well, that...takes care of that, I suppose.

I do wish this had gone a different way, but you did what you had to do. I appreciate that. We all do.

If you'll give me just a moment, I need to take a moment for the man I once knew.
